name: Clarion Hotel Bryggen

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just back from a 3 night stay at the Clarion Bryggen in Tromso. It is a pleasant enough hotel but we felt that we had a bad deal room wise. It was nicely decorated but was pretty small and the bed didn't even look like a full size double. We didn't complain as we assumed that all rooms would be this size, however we noticed a couple of bedroom doors whilst being cleaned and the rooms were far bigger, perhaps we just got this because we were late arriving and that was all that was left. The staff are very friendly and helpful although I agree with previous reviews re. the housekeeping. We went out for a few hours, came back at 3 pm and our room hadn't been made up which seemed a bit off given that there were lots of staff around. The breakfast is excellent - buffet style with lots of choice, and it's all organic. The location of the hotel is great - walking distance to everything, and lovely views over the water.
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I chose this hotel as when I booked it was the number 1 hotel in Tromso on Trip advisor, I see it has now slipped to 5 and I am not surprised.
reviews.title: Loved Tromso, shame about the hotel

likes.disliked: — Small rooms and cleanliness was significantly below expectations

reviews.text: The rooms on the 1st floor are small and there is very little space to hang clothes, we were staying for 6 nights so this was an issue for us. We basically couldn't unpack. I don't know if the other floors are better.
reviews.title: Comfy and Friendly, but the eggs were cold...

likes.liked: — It was clean and perfectly Ok for anights stay
likes.disliked: — Beds a bit narrow I like to spread out a bit

reviews.text: This hotel was perfectly adequate as a base for exploring Tromso and the surrounding area. The room itself was clean, spacious and serviceable, and the staff were courteous. Breakfast was the usual buffet fare. The central location is a big bonus - it really couldn't be better placed.
reviews.title: A good base for exploring a wonderful part of the world
Not worth the price
reviews.text: They could do with re-decorating the corridors, and tea/coffee facilities in the room would be nice, but these are very minor quibbles. Recommended.

This place has potential--the heated floor in the bathroom and modern shower were great. But the carpet in the room was filthy, as were those in the hallways. Pictures had been removed from the walls of the room and bare nails left. Go across the street to another Clarion for a much better experience.
reviews.title: Fabulous hotel...fabulous tour guide!

reviews.text: Have just returned from spending a couple of nights at the Hotel Bryggen over Easter. After 2 average nights in Oslo, Tromso and the hotel were fabulous.
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel

description: Modern design on the pier! Feel the snow in your hair while resting in our outdoor jacuzzi under the Northern lights or during the summer while sun is shining all day and all night. Our excellent staff will be more than happy to serve you at all times whether it is regarding adventure bookings or having a meal in our restaurant or lounge area. Fantastic sea view from the restaurant, the outdoor jacuzzi and some of our superior rooms. All common areas were renovated in 2012 an all rooms got new floors, new easy chairs and new fabrics. All bathrooms have heated floors. The hotel is very close to all main attractions in Tromso and only a short walk from the Hurtigruten pier, the airport bus and all other buses that will take you around where ever you would like to go.
